Articles.Content: Hello, I would like to remove the corona around Kerbol. Is that possible and if yes, then how can I do it?

I would reccomend using a dry erase marker.  Just color over the edges until you get to the amount of sun you want to see.   Use a dry erase instead of a sharpie, as moving the camera will completely negate the effects of a sharpie.

 

Sorry, got nothing useful.   Just in a mood tonight and being an obnoxious twit.
